name: MeUndies, Inc.
description: Manufacturer of underwear and loungewear for men and women. The company offers bralettes, socks, swimwear, hoodies, robes, headbands and buddy bands, thereby enabling customers with comfortable and fast-trend undies and apparel at an affordable rate.
one_liner: Manufacturer of underwear and loungewear for men and women. The company offers bralettes, socks, swimwear, hoodies, robes, headbands and buddy bands, thereby enabling customers with comfortable and fast-trend undies and apparel at an affordable rate.
